title: What king or large black jet has been flying over Wilmington yesterday Sat. and today ( Sunday) at approx. 11:08 am and again at 12:04 in the area South of the airport. If it\'s not the normal touch and go\'s then who is training and going so low?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=17787
